name: BobTheFish - Android
description:
Bob The Fish is a game. The main character of Bob The Fish is a fish attacked by opponents in the sea, while he tries to collect as many crystals and stars as possible.

Bob The Fish, press to go up, release to go down. Collect as many crystals as you can and avoid deep sea creatures.

Play Store Page => https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=aleksandar.a2dgamefragments
